name: browser_automation
description: Enhanced browser automation tool with comprehensive web interaction capabilities. Supports Firefox and Chrome, article extraction, screenshots, form filling, element interaction, JavaScript execution, and much more.

url.description: The full URL of the page to navigate to, for example: https://example.com

headless.description: Run browser in headless mode. Default: true

extract_article.description: Extract main article text using advanced algorithms including readability scoring. Default: false

take_screenshot.description: Capture a screenshot of the page. Returns base64 encoded image. Default: false

user_agent.description: Custom user agent string to use for requests

implicit_wait.description: Implicit wait timeout in seconds. Default: 10

page_load_wait.description: Additional time to wait after page load in seconds. Default: 2

disable_images.description: Disable image loading for faster page loads. Default: false

disable_css.description: Disable CSS loading for faster page loads. Default: false

proxy_url.description: Proxy server URL to use for requests

execute_js.description: JavaScript code to execute on the page. Result will be included in output

wait_for_element.description: CSS selector of element to wait for before proceeding. Will timeout after 10 seconds

click_element.description: CSS selector of element to click

type_text.description: Text to type into an element (requires type_selector)

type_selector.description: CSS selector of element to type text into (used with type_text)

scroll_to.description: Scroll target: 'top', 'bottom', or CSS selector of element to scroll to

set_cookies.description: Cookies to set before navigation in format 'name1=value1; name2=value2'

get_cookies.description: Retrieve all cookies from the page. Default: false

fill_form.description: Form data to fill in format 'selector1=value1; selector2=value2'

save_path.description: Local file path to save the extracted content (HTML or article text)
